DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether neuropeptide oxytocin ( OXT ) influence self-processing investigate whether increase endowment effect relation self others .
DOC.detailed_description: In double-blind , between- subject placebo ( PLC ) control design , investigator aim measure effect intranasal OXT endowment effect . All subject complete range questionnaire measure personality affective trait level anxiety self-administration : Positive Negative Affect Schedule ( PANAS ) , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , self-esteem scale ( SES ) . Subjects ask decide whether buy sell others ' ( mothers'/ fathers'/ classmate'/ stranger ' ) possession various price . Indifference point brain activation inluded analysis dependent variable .
DOC.criteria: healthy subject without past current psychiatric neurological disorder history head injury ; claustrophobia ; medical psychiatric illness .
